Sentencas: In April 2000 Siemens Westinghouse started work under a co-operation agreement with Shell International to develop and demonstrate a natural gas fired 0.25 MW solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) modified to enable capture of carbon dioxide.
Titulo: Progress with the development of a CO2 capturing solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The basic principles of this development and initial plans for the demonstration, which is due to start up at a Norwegian location in 2003, have been presented in environmental and fuel cell forums during 1999/2000.
Titulo: Progress with the development of a CO2 capturing solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This paper reviews the latest technical progress with this development and discusses the large potential market for stationary power generation using SOFCs with CO2 capturing capability.
Titulo: Progress with the development of a CO2 capturing solid oxide fuel cell
Progress with the development of a CO2 capturing solid oxide fuel cell
